titles: Considerations touching the true way to suppress popery in this kingdom by making a distinction between men of loyal and disloyal principles in that communion : on occasion whereof is inserted an historical account of the Reformation here in England.
author: Lloyd, William, 1627-1717.
notes: This item can also be found as part of Lloyd's Several tracts against popery located at reel 388:23.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
